questions: Is there a cat in the image?
Is there a microwave in the image?
Is the cat on the bottom of the microwave?
model_output:
yes The lower part of a cat's face is visible at the bottom of the image.
no There is an object resembling a microwave oven base but missing the upper part including the door and controls.
no The visible part of the cat appears below what seems to be the base of a microwave, not on top of it.
